briefTitle: A Trial to Compare the Efficacy and Safety of Once-weekly Lonapegsomatropin With Placebo and a Daily Somatropin Product in Adults With Growth Hormone Deficiency
officialTitle: foresiGHt: A Multicenter, Randomized, Parallel-arm, Placebo-controlled (Double- Blind) and Active-controlled (Open-label) Trial to Compare the Efficacy and Safety of Once-weekly Lonapegsomatropin With Placebo and a Daily Somatropin Product in Adults With Growth Hormone Deficiency
summary: A 38-week dosing trial of lonapegsomatropin, a long-acting growth hormone product, administered once-a-week versus placebo-control. A daily somatropin product arm is also included to assist clinical judgement on the trial results. A total of 264 adults (males and females) with growth hormone deficiency were included. Randomization occurred in a 1:1:1 ratio (lonapegsomatropin: placebo: daily somatropin product). This is a global trial conducted in, but not limited to, the United States, Europe, and Asia.

primaryOutcome.measure: Change From Baseline in Trunk Percent Fat at Week 38
